Container.Overview: [span style=\'color: #0046FF;\']library/mariadb:label[br] Docker image for Nextcloud from official Docker Image.[br] This image uses MYSQL/MariaDB for the back end.[br] See Exist2Resist MariaDb docker to get that up and running.[br][br] [span style=\'color: #00FF23;\'] Add a :label tag to the Repository field[br] Label options:[br] 15, 16 ...or stable, 20 or latest[br] ex. Repository: nextcloud:stable[br][br] Using the Nextcloud command-line interface[br] To use the Nextcloud command-line interface (aka. occ command):[br] $ docker exec --user www-data CONTAINER_ID php occ[br][br] [span style=\'color: #E80000;\']WARNING: If you do not have a persisitent storage "Main Folder" value and you update your MariaDB docker the data will be wiped.[/span][br] [/span] Run Example:[br] docker run --restart=always --net=bridge --name Nextcloud -p 443:443 -v /mnt/user/appdata/nextcloud/:/var/www/html/config \[br] -d nextcloud:20 \[br] [br][br] optional:[br]
